website_summaries.verdict: Buyers seeking a sun hat with the utmost in sun protection should check out this heavy-duty option.
pros: Includes flap for back and sides of neck, as well as a face mask for front sun protection
Offered in a few different colors

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly as the image portrays and fits really well. The brim is soft and the material light. It seems well made and fits exactly how I hoped it would and being outdoors in the blazing sun checking terrain for construction sites. It's a more than welcomed addition to my gear.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Working in a scrap yard helps
customer_reviews.text: Working outside for more than 11 hrs a day in Houston Texas is HOT. Honestly this helps out a lot. Keeps my face clean from the yard dirt and obviously Blocks the sun so no sunburn. The material feels cool so is not uncomfortable oh and I can actually breath with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jose vargas

customer_reviews.title: wow great hat
customer_reviews.text: Well what can I say , this hat is very very light weight, very well made, and does what they it supposed to do and protect my neck from sunburn I love it and got it for a great price
customer_reviews.author: Allen Mayhew

customer_reviews.title: The mask and backing had excellent coverage from the AZ sun
customer_reviews.text: This hat seemed well made and I wish I could keep it, but it was too small (I wear a size 7 1/2 fitted hat). The mask and backing had excellent coverage from the AZ sun, along with feeling much cooler in the mid afternoon full sun. Other hats just haven't compared to the coverage, but I'm still trying. The mask has two sets of metal button that holds quite well and the back sun shade has plastic clips that hold securely...but may to fragile in the long term. There is also a liner inside the hat rim for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this hate with the intention to use in Alaska to protect me from the sun while on a glacier. Cool design but unfortunately a snap botton broke literally the first time I tried to remove the face mask part (within 5 min of opening). Cheap quality, would NOT recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Opie

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: I can't imagine being charged more than 50 cents for this garbage hat. A paper bag would work better, and probably be more durable in the ocean, sense that's what I bought this hat for. I would strongly recommend not buying this product, or from the Chinese company that made it. The face and neck covers both ripped off the very first time I tried it on. I'm gonna sow it back together and use it because I need it tomorrow. But after that, its going in the trash, and I'll shop for a more quality one next time. This product would have got 0 stars if that was an option.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle wamberg

customer_reviews.title: Absolute solar protection
customer_reviews.text: As it may be too early to say. I've had this product for amir 4 weeks now. I live in Arizona, so l use it every day. So far l absolutely love that the mask and neck drape are both neatly tucked into the lid of the cap or easily removed for those that may only need it in rare cases. Excited to learn how well the fabric takes a Arizona summer and a toss in the washing machine a couple times a week. I strongly encourage anyone looking for absolute solar protection to invest in this fabulous piece of apparel
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ddyoutdoor 07-281 Summer Sun Hat
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised by this sun hat. I have tried others that didn't really do the job. This hat will keep the sun's rays off your head, face and neck. It is very light weight and comfortable. I used it last week out fishing on the river, and no sunburn for a change. You will look goofy wearing it, but it does the job!
customer_reviews.author: JNPDX

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: one of the clips fell off very quickly making the hat unfit for me almost immediately after wearing
customer_reviews.author: Review

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't offer real sun protection
customer_reviews.text: I very much liked the light-weight design and look of the product but not the sun protection capability. In fact, the sun protection ability of this product is nearly nonexistent. Trust me on this one, I work outdoors in the intense south Florida sun nearly every day of the week and I would certainly know about sun protection. The design of this "fishing cap" is flimsy and of poor construction and will not hold up to repeated use but it's certainly very comfortable to wear!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: I have very fair skin and burn easily, so this hat was great
customer_reviews.text: I have very fair skin and burn easily, so this hat was great. Especially liked that both the neck/ear flap and the face cover were easily removable. The neck/ear flaps worked well, and the hat is light weight and cool - doesn't make your head hot. I didn't use the face cover, but in the right situation I would have - in spite of the weird way it makes you look.
customer_reviews.author: Edward K.

customer_reviews.title: ... from the Sun quality of it being made as poor stitching around the rim of the hat is not ...
customer_reviews.text: Although this product is exactly what I wanted to help protect from the Sun quality of it being made as poor stitching around the rim of the hat is not complete Clips to the neck sun protector not line up so sit crooked don't know if I would buy this product again from this manufacturer
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Face Coverage
customer_reviews.text: Bought this hat a couple of years ago. Loved it then and love it even more now. Never thought I would end up using it to protect myself and others during a pandemic! At least I look great and stylish doing it. I always get stares and double takes when I go out for those essentials.
customer_reviews.author: Rustin-Travis Walker

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: These things don't come in sizes believe it or not some people's heads are pretty big sending it back because it's too small too tight
customer_reviews.author: D.p.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Breathable!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because I can't breathe in the medical type masks that everybody's wearing during this difficult time. I will probably be attaching a filter of some sort to the mesh part, and later on, I guess I'll be all geared up for fishing! Ha! It's very lightweight and yet impressively high quality construction. I also love hats, so this is a win-win. I bought the charcoal color by the way and I really love it.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Erwood

customer_reviews.title: Flimsey hat; Does not work
customer_reviews.text: After receiving this very thin hat, I had to look elsewhere for a much better quality hat. I must keep my face out of the sun and thought this would be the answer....wrong.
customer_reviews.author: QQMKXP938

customer_reviews.title: Good job: The best I've used so far
customer_reviews.text: I do native plant habitat restoration, which involves weeding full-time six months a year, often in hot sun. I bought this hat along with some others as a competitive trial. This is clearly the best of the group, as the full brim shades the neck flap so that it doesn't receive and trap as much heat. It is light, cool, and well-ventilated but apparently strong enough to withstand considerable wear. About the only thing I could wish for would be additional detachable sweat bands (I'm guessing 3 per hat).
customer_reviews.author: Mark Vande Pol

customer_reviews.title: Works good, Looks funny.
customer_reviews.text: We look like a couple of unibombers, but this hat blocks the sun from our hair and faces. I'm allergic to sunblock, so I needed something. We kayak all the time, when the weather is nice. I bought the light one for me, and the darker brown for my husband. What can I say? They work. The only problem we have is that when it's cold, and we have the facegard pulled up, it can fog up our sunglasses, when the weather is cold.
customer_reviews.author: Chetti

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable for protection during Covid-19, useful for after
customer_reviews.text: it's light weight and comfortable. The face covering is adequate as I don't come into close contact with people during this pandemic. and my glasses don't fog up
customer_reviews.author: CD

customer_reviews.title: Best Headgear of It’s Kind That I Have Used
customer_reviews.text: Not only for UV protection, but Covid-19 as well, though as it is not a N95 mask, it does not fully protect from the virus, but neither are most any the public are wearing today. Still, protects more as well as is more breathable, offering multiple protections and in a variety of colors. Certainly should be considered by anyone engaged in outdoor activities. Finally, as made of nylon, easy to wash and dry, even without a washer/dryer.
customer_reviews.author: William Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Good sun hat for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I bought this for a trip to the Florida Keys and it worked as expected. The quality of the material might've been slightly less than I expected, but honestly I suppose my expectations may have been a little high for the low price. I will say that while the sun coverage is great, wearing the mask walking around town can get a little bit creepy so just keep that in mind. Bottom line is: I will keep wearing it, and I would recommend it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Some guy

customer_reviews.title: What a find!  I LOVE this thing!
customer_reviews.text: So like a dummy, I washed my old lawn hat. It was older and not all that great quality - and it came apart in the wash :( But then I found this fishing hat that I'm going to use for a lawn working hat & a fishing hat! What a find - this thing is absolutely awesome. So lightweight and well made. Fits well, and I love love love the detachable flaps. Already gave it a try for mowing and weed eating and it worked way better than my old hat. Great product - I highly recommend it to anyone that wants to keep the sun off your head, face and neck.
customer_reviews.author: Connie McDonald

customer_reviews.title: Don't believe the hype.
customer_reviews.text: Disliked this product, greatly. Had high hopes for it, too. I'm a black man, who gets sunburn, so I have to stay covered in the summer. Saw this and it had great reviews, so I bought it. Went to Panama city Beach in June, the sun went right through this hat. Really disappointed, wish I could get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron Tucker

customer_reviews.title: We are all gonna die.
customer_reviews.text: FABOO ACOUTREMAN ACCESSORY FOR THE 2020 COVID AND MURDER HORNET SEASONS, DID I MENTION LOCUST NEXT!
customer_reviews.author: Philip Mosely

customer_reviews.title: Made for small heads
customer_reviews.text: Does not fit at all. I think it was for a child or small person. Not even close.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: HIgh Quality and Comfortable Hat
customer_reviews.text: This hat looks and feels really nice. It is well worth the money it cost. I highly recommend it to protect you from the sun and COVID19.
customer_reviews.author: Lesley L. Young

customer_reviews.title: The Right Hat for a Fisherman
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. He loves to fish 🎣 & to be outdoors but has to protect his skin from the sun. He ❤️ this hat, neck guard & face guard. He likes how light weight it is, breathable & it really provides the great sun protection.
customer_reviews.author: Jill H.

customer_reviews.title: Probably not great for completely bald people, edited to say it's not bad
customer_reviews.text: Edit: I've used this hat for a year or two, and the Velcro hadn't really ever irritated me much. Original: The Velcro where the mask portion attaches is on the inside where your temples rub against it. If you're bald or have buzzed hair, probably not the hat for you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product is well constructed, not well designed.
customer_reviews.text: Looks cool... works well, but... it to cumbersome to put on and take off. Gives good coverage around the back of the head. Plastic parts attaching it are fragile. face part has snaps and require taking the has off to attach it then you have to figure out how to put the hat on fully assembled. - good vendor, quick delivery... product is well constructed, not well designed.
customer_reviews.author: digitalsavant

customer_reviews.title: Neck flap could be better designed. Small plastic hooks on the flap are ...
customer_reviews.text: Neck flap could be better designed. Small plastic hooks on the flap are supposed to hook into small loops on the hat, and while the hooks are very small (hard to manipulate), the loops don't hold the flap on securely enough to stay connected. Turn your head slightly and it all comes apart. I cut off the plastic hooks. replaced them with small key rings and metal snap hooks. Now works like a charm
customer_reviews.author: Roger

customer_reviews.title: Works as a face mask with a little sewing.
customer_reviews.text: Wanted a face mask. Sewed piece of cloth inside of mesh face covering. Works very well. Stays in place. Covers nose and mouth. Have not used in the sun. Have used to go to a store.
customer_reviews.author: David J.

customer_reviews.title: It’s not grey, it’s periwinkle blue!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a grey hat, but instead received a light periwinkle blue one. I tried to trade it to hubby for an old tan one, but it looks too feminine. It’s also too big for me so I had to cinch it up a lot in the back and that looked goofy too. Not loving it!
customer_reviews.author: TucsonTNR

customer_reviews.title: Great hat, couldn't be happier!
customer_reviews.text: This hat is freakin awesome! The top section that goes around your head actually has a small portion of mesh that allows air flow up into your head all the way around. It's great! The front piece and back piece of the hat are separate and removable. The front piece is held in with some velcro pieces, and the rear piece that covers the back of your neck is held on with some small plastic clips. Overall, I think this was the best hat for the price that offers sun protection that covers your entire head!
customer_reviews.author: U.M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: I love this light weight complete coverage face, neck, ears, head complete coverage hat. I am adding a thin piece of velcro around the inside of the face mask so I will be able to add a removable HEPA filter mask around the mouth as the hat allows you to cinch it shut under the chin, thus making a good seal. I am very happy with this hat.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Doll

customer_reviews.title: Not fashionable but does the trick well!
customer_reviews.text: I am a big hiker and live in a very sunny climate so I am always looking for ways to cover up. I have had all kinds of hiking hats. This one is lightweight and as comfy as these things get when you are wearing a hat. Very good coverage. Today I even ventured to use the face mask part as I was not wearing enough sunscreen. I wouldn't go looking for compliments on the fashion statement it makes, but if you are concerned about skin damage, this is a good choice. An added bonus is that you can go incognito, cause no one will ever recognize you :)
customer_reviews.author: glinda

customer_reviews.title: Great sun coverage and it’s pretty light
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I have a skin condition and I cannot be in the sun for long. This definitely works for me and the good thing is that it doubles as a Shredder costume from the Ninja Turtles. This provides great sun coverage and I was able to stay outdoors for a few hours without any issues. When I don’t use the front face cover I just stuff it in the hat and it is still comfortable enough to wear. The hat and screens are all made of a light material so this is comfortable to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Very functional
customer_reviews.text: This hat does a nice job protecting ears and neck from sun exposure. The face mask attachment protects against flying debris when using a string trimmer and also from annoying gnats. Washable. It is not very attractive but I find it to be very useful and always wear while gardening or doing yardwork.
customer_reviews.author: Slimjim

customer_reviews.title: mask does not stay in place and I had to ...
customer_reviews.text: mask does not stay in place and I had to keep bring it up my nose. It should have been designed to cover your face right up to top of your nose but it starts sagging and everything get tangled as soon as you take them off. I think the mask should have been made with the material that has more elasticity so it stay tightly around your face.
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Light, optional capes, and awesome price!
customer_reviews.text: This is my new kayaking hat. On long hauls the reflected light can get you even under a wide hat, so I'm glad to have the optional capes. With both capes deployed, button your collar and you're also bugproof. So I'm set for daytime and harsh sunlight, and nighttime with mosquito protection. CANNOT BEAT THE PRICE. I wish the brim were stiffer or could be shaped more easily, it mostly does this wave around my head. Well, kayaking makes me look like a mighty adventurer anyway, I don't need ace hat style, lol.
customer_reviews.author: Lo Faszt

customer_reviews.title: Good hat!!
customer_reviews.text: This hat is great, I use it when fishing. Granted, you are still going to be mildly uncomfortable when the sun is beating down on you and you have this much fabric on your head, but it's a pretty good compromise for complete sun protection (it's much more comfortable than a baseball cap and buff combination, imho.) And another nice feature is that if you are not using all the sun protection options, you can "store" the next and face flap in the top of the hat while you are wearing it normally...you don't have to remove them. I find this useful.
customer_reviews.author: FireZeMissles

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Bought the hat for my husband who lovessss fishing! This hat gives him perfect protection from the sun because even all the sunblock in the world can’t work when you’re out on the river casting over and over again. He loves it, great color and a great quality. Best part about it, the face cover is removable/adjustable, so it can be hand washed after a sweaty day. Also, it allows for the hat to be worn independently. Overall, a must have item if you’re an outdoorsy person like my hubby.
customer_reviews.author: Sara E

customer_reviews.title: Great Value for a Sun Hat - Keeps you cool & sunburn free!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great value - Keeps your head cool & out of the sun (SPF 50) and the wide brim is handy when the sun is at an angle. The side curtain at the back can be tucked up under your hat when you don't need it on your back. Wish it could be disconnected. You can disconnect the chin cord & front cover so if you don't need it (I didn't like them), then you don't have to have them flopping around. Well ventilated at the top for evaporation to keep you cool! For the money paid (not much), this was a GREAT value and I'd be happy to buy again if I ever lose this hat.
customer_reviews.author: BIGGER_HAMMER

customer_reviews.title: Keeps sun off my face!
customer_reviews.text: I love this hat. I had sone precancerous spots removed from my face so I wanted something to cover my face, in addition to sunscreen. I actually wear this hat with face shield when I float in out pool or swim laps (when it is just family) . I live in Texas, so its hot but this hat is light weight and breatable. I have washed it several times and still looks good. I look pretty goofy wearing it but it protects my face and allows me to enjoy my pool. I also use it for yard work.
customer_reviews.author: karis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hot summer day!
customer_reviews.text: I got one of these for myself and one for my husband. We are outdoors a lot doing yard work , gardening, or cleaning up the fields on our property. We live in AL and it is hot during the summer. These hats are lightweight and protect us from the sun's harmful rays, especially using the neck attachment. The part that covers your face is great as well. I hate anything covering my nose and mouth that is tight, this is not and it does a great job at filtering the dust and grass.
customer_reviews.author: FlygirlKS

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for your buck -- lots of shade and sun protection
customer_reviews.text: You cannot argue that for the cost, this hat provides you a great amount of shade from the sun, your neck is protected with the neck covering it comes with and the face shield works really well! Hiked through some forests where i needed the face shield due to bugs and it helped tremendously. This hat has a tightening bungee type cable on top of hat to tighten it for quick removal. Also has the lace under the chin. Water resistant, walked in rain and didn't feel one drop. Hat did not get wet either. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Danegerous45

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, Comfortable, and Blocks the Sun!
customer_reviews.text: I recently went on a hike with my boyfriend and we both have different skintones. He is very pale and burns easily, and I am brown and tan quickly. Well, despite me not burning easy, I also don't want to age prematurely so I take good care of my skin and I'm hardly ever in the sun. We bought two of these caps and were pleasantly surprised by how airy it was even when we used the front cover. At the end of the day, he didn't burn and I didn't tan at all. I highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Gaby

customer_reviews.title: Awesome hat!
customer_reviews.text: I have a wide brim hat for when I am working in the yard under the hot sun. The problem is it does not have any neck protection. I saw this hat on Prime Day and knew it would work for me. This hat is very light weight and breathable on top. The front and side/back fabric are separately removable. As other reviewers have mentioned, the fabric pieces connect with tiny plastic clips which seem fragile. The only problem I have with this hat is the front face shield is too small. Maybe I have a big head but I cannot attach the snaps with the hat on my head.
customer_reviews.author: Zi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect hat
customer_reviews.text: This hat is perfect! The material it is made out of is breathable, and it's flexible enough to fold up for travel. When unfolded, the hat keeps its shape. This allows it to keep you in your personal shade keeping you cool. The neck flap is perfect for the times when the brim won't provide enough neck coverage, and the mask is a huge plus with all of the Covid stuff. I use the hat for landscaping, but I'm gonna buy a second for personal use.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Miller

customer_reviews.title: Basically as described
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two different colors, having to order separately, for some unknown reason why???. Light weight and fits properly. Hopefully the sun protection is true for I do a lot of outside work. The hat's mask felt comfortable, but I don't believe it will be sufficient for blocking dust. Possibly using a dust mask outside the hat's mask will do the trick, as the dust masks can be irritating after a while. Good for the price.
customer_reviews.author: John E. Zellner

customer_reviews.title: Quick Delivery a huge plus but not big enough
customer_reviews.text: I hate these one size fits all hats yes it can be made larger but if you have a big head like mine it doesn't get big enough the mask is real tight over the face hat fits ok the back sun shield is good. If you have a small head this would be perfect for you...
customer_reviews.author: John Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Great value. Great coverage. Great hat.
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this hat while I mow grass. Does an excellent job of sun protection. I wear the mask as well. Minimizes the amount of grass and dust that can fly down your shirt, causing itching. Plus, going through cobwebs in the trees no longer hits my face! The hat is adjustable with a plastic cinch to provide a better fit. Chin strap keeps hat on your head in windy conditions. A well designed, affordable hat! I would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: E. Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Great idea. Hat will be ok for traveling in ...
customer_reviews.text: Great idea. Hat will be ok for traveling in the wind on the boat. Great for the price. In back of the hat is a cord for adjusting hat size...nice. Love the front face flap. It can be removed when not needed. This is NOT the hat you want for looks. If you need one for looks then you might as well buy the Tilley hat ( but MUCH more expensive). Another reviewer said the flaps will blow off in the wind because the clamps are not completely secure. If this becomes a problem, I will fix them so they won't blow off.
customer_reviews.author: Leigh

customer_reviews.title: nice and cool hat
customer_reviews.text: So this mask is for sun protect. Not for virus protection. But it is a great way to walk outside. Not get hot and bothered and to feel some level of protection and protecting others. I have removed the back neck coverage and that makes it even more comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: J. Levin

customer_reviews.title: Nice hat
customer_reviews.text: This was the best hat I have bought in a long time. Covers perfectly! Works very well.
customer_reviews.author: Doctort

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, lightweight sun protection
customer_reviews.text: I hate hats, I've refused to wear them even skiing. Now, needing to protect my pate from hot Hawaiian sun I'm out in for hours every day, this hat is easy and comfortable to wear, for hours. Super lightweight yet holds its shape after a few washings, the neck guard easily covers shoulders. Plenty of coverage from the sun - but not hot! I would definitely buy another one when this wears out, which it shows no sign of doing yet!
customer_reviews.author: Dragon9

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Needed Yesterday
customer_reviews.text: When it arrived I was starting to seal my rooftop with a baseball cap and small towel over my neck and was sweating a lot, then I use this and WOW what a difference how I feel the air circulating the top of my head and stop the sweat. Love the style and the material they use. Feels light but at the same feels like is very tough and durable. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JVB

customer_reviews.title: Full coverage
customer_reviews.text: I've tried so many different UV products, this one is by far the best. I just went on a long brutal hike from Yosemite village up to the top of the half dome. It was over 90F and I had no problem breathing in this hat with the mouth cover on all the time. What made me happiest was that my face was well protected and my freckles DID NOT darken, yay!!
customer_reviews.author: P. Liew

customer_reviews.title: Durable, light weight and a great fit
customer_reviews.text: My husband needed a hat that would both keep the sun off his neck, and allow him to mow the lawn without getting dirt/pollen in his face. This hat fit perfectly and is light weight enough that it keeps him from sweating in the hot FL sun. The piece that goes across you mouth/nose is light weight and does it's job well. It is also adjustable so it fits him well. Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.author: Sarah kaufman

customer_reviews.title: Good Multi Purpose Hat
customer_reviews.text: This is a multi purpose Hat. It's comfortable, light weight, protects your head & face from the sun rays. With the attachable piece it can also protect the back of your neck. Attaching the front piece protects your nose & mouth from the wind, smoke, sand, etc. So if you are looking for nice quality Hat that protects you from many of the elements (sun, wind, etc) then I recommend you try this Hat.
customer_reviews.author: Princezz

customer_reviews.title: Great hiking hat
customer_reviews.text: Great wide brim hat for hiking. I bought this for a hike down the South Kaibab trail into the Grand Canyon. It did not disappoint. I didn't use the face mask portion, but kept the rear shield on which worked well at keeping the sun off the back of my neck and shoulders. Also, I have a big head and most ball caps fit snug on me. This fit very comfortably on my head.
customer_reviews.author: Doit2it

customer_reviews.title: as I like the lightweight material and the protection afforded by the ...
customer_reviews.text: Initially I was going to return the item, because the face mask part is too large for me and falls below the nose, even though I adjusted it. However, I decided to keep it and just remove the face mask, as I like the lightweight material and the protection afforded by the side and back flaps. I live in the desert and I think the hat will not cause me to sweat as much as my other hats because it is so lightweight. I will use it with my regular facemask.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: I like the weight and fabric of this hat
customer_reviews.text: I like the weight and fabric of this hat. It has great coverage in the sun and is not much trouble to get the face and neck pieces on. Quality is not good. Face cover is velcro connected and works well, but the back cover is set in hooks. One of the pieces that connect the hook was not stitched when it arrived. Still usable though.
customer_reviews.author: dashreeve

customer_reviews.title: Fits Great! - Guys want to have sex with me more now!
customer_reviews.text: Putting this on, nobody can tell it's me and they want more sex...WOW! does the Tricks! :) My BF, who is lazy AF won't say crap, but if I put this on and come in the back door, he's all about throwing me down in the basement in the sling! WOO-HOO!..it's soo cool. Just odd that I have to immediately leave out the back door, then sneak in the front door with it hidden in the car. But it works Great!
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Giovanni M.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job well!!!
customer_reviews.text: This hat is great for working outside around the home and garden. The wide brim and neck /shoulder flap keep the sun's rays at bay. The face flap is good for keeping errant grass clippings off when using the grass trimmer too. Quality seems pretty decent for the price. I am using this practically every day. I hope it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Slow

customer_reviews.title: Light weight colorful and super handy
customer_reviews.text: By far, one of the best protection against to much sun or dust! Excellent product, I would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: John Pete

customer_reviews.title: Great, good-looking sun-protective hat with neck veil.
customer_reviews.text: I like this hat a lot. It's a great green color, will fit any size head by using the adjustable cord, and doesn't look stupid. Lightweight. Good quality. The only problem, as other buyers have noted, is that it comes folded with a strong bend across one side of the brim - hard to smooth out. The veil is a little skimpier than I would have preferred when snapped across the face, but works well. I love the hat and will get a ton of use out of it.
customer_reviews.author: pupsik

customer_reviews.title: Best buy for the times
customer_reviews.text: great hat, I bought it in November of 2019 had no idea I would need it as we do now day's! Wisest purchase I've made!
customer_reviews.author: Johnnyhatchett

customer_reviews.title: Worked Great!!
customer_reviews.text: This hat made my vacation and absolute success! I spent eight days in Cancun Mexico I did not need sunscreen for my face or my neck. The hat stood up to intense heat and humidity as well as a few jungle showers. I did not use the facemask so I can’t comment on its effectiveness. Would highly recommend this hat to any fair skinned person wanting protection from the sun. The only concern with this hat is I noticed after a week in the Mexican jungles that the metal grommets are beginning to rust. However, the rest of the hat is intact and in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: T_Aupperle

customer_reviews.title: Too BIG
customer_reviews.text: I’m 5’7”, 130 lb female with a small head. I bought this hat based on the reviews stating it would fit smaller heads which is disappointing because when I tried it on at it’s tightest cinch it fell below my eyebrows. Aaargh. Thank goodness my husband can use it for kayaking and fishing.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce B. Grable

customer_reviews.title: Good sun hat!
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, light weight, fits even my small head. The only thing I don't like about it is the plastic hook/clip things that hold the neck covering in place. Other than that it's pretty nice.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Miller

customer_reviews.title: Almost a good "sun" hat
customer_reviews.text: This hat has a mesh area around the sides of the top of the head which allow sun to hit your head. So it really fails protecting one from the sun in that area. And the detachable face shield is really tight. I would be better if the flap that covers the neck were not so tight and did a better job of covering the lower front of the neck, and the face shield were not so tight and were more adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: R. L. Tompkins

customer_reviews.title: CEO of Sunblocking
customer_reviews.text: This would be a great fit for a small or average sized person but I am a large man and my head is a little too big for it. It looks awesome when wearing it though!!! You look like a cowboy or a bada** character from RDR2. I will most likely have to cut the hat a bit, sew on the mask and neck cover because it is very tight, but it looks way better than anything else out there!
customer_reviews.author: J Llanos

customer_reviews.title: Great Sun Hat
customer_reviews.text: Great sun hat, I work as an electrical solar installer and work in the sun all day, the hat has a wide brim and great thick flap for neck protection and the face cover works well. I usually wear it under my hard hat as extra protection from the sun and if it gets really hot I wet it with some water and it stay cool for a couple of hours. Great hat would recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jose I. M.

customer_reviews.title: So far so good.
customer_reviews.text: Material seems a little cheap, but so far has survived several washes. My wife uses it for her job as a Utility meter maintenance person in NorCal. It’s been a really hot summer, so the light weight fishing hat, and attachments keep her protected, as well as gives people comfort that she has a mask on. Will probably buy another for her backup, as long as the price point doesn’t go up.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Michael Montes

customer_reviews.title: Great for Mowing
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 acres to mow every weekend. This cap is perfect for keeping the sun off my head, face and neck. The face flap keeps the grass out of my nose and mouth on those windy days. I was surprised at how cool I felt with all this material on my head and face.
customer_reviews.author: Henry

customer_reviews.title: If you're looking for a nice, lightweight shade hat, this is hard to beat. I really like this
customer_reviews.text: As a guy I wanted something lightweight, reasonably good looking and durable. After 6 months and a couple of washes later it still looks great. Good coverage around my neck and most of my shoulders. Not crazy big and wide, but not too small so it defeats the purpose of a shade hat. I have yet to use the added attached neck/shade protection. I took it off for now.
customer_reviews.author: Mustangjoey

customer_reviews.title: This thing saved me
customer_reviews.text: This summer was so hot, I left my grill covered and cooked on the driveway. (Kidding) this hat is perfect for mowing grass or any outdoor activity that has you in the sun for extended periods of time. You won’t be disappointed with this. It works great!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Nothing to not like...
customer_reviews.text: This product is perfect for: keeping the sun rays from hitting you What I liked about this product: I liked how the back flap of the hat has two buttons at each end that wrap around your neck to cover the drawstring of the mask. This provides all around sun protection from the neck up. What I didn’t like: There was nothing I didn’t like about this hat. overall thoughts: I’d highly recommend it to people who work outdoors so they can cover up from the suns harmful rays.
customer_reviews.author: nic_nax_1989

customer_reviews.title: Loved the coverage it provided. Too small. Not a one-size fits all as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the coverage it provided. But it was too small. Not a one-size fits all as advertised. With the face and neck covers attached, it is too tight. I found my nose compressed and temples had pressure where the face cover attach. My wife loves to wear it though. Guess Ill have to find something else as this didnt have a larger size.
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: Good sun protection!
customer_reviews.text: The part that covers the face doesn't stay down in the wind, so that's very annoying and kind of defeats the purpose. And, the Velcro parts that the face cover part attaches to (above the ears on the inside of the hat) can be uncomfortable sometimes (rub against the head). Besides that though, it fits great (snug but not tight--don't have to worry about it possibly flying away). Color is nice and rich (I got green) so it doesn't look or feel cheap. It's on the thicker side so it doesn't feel flimsy/feels like pretty good quality. And the vents help make sure there's some ventilation. Good for those trying to hide from/protect themselves from the sun, like me (:
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Y.

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome! I bought this for my husband since he’s always outside in the sun unprotected (stubborn) and he was really happy that I got him this! now he takes it everywhere from yard work, fishing, trips to the zoo and even to disney. it’s perfect and not to heavy on the face. a must buy!
customer_reviews.author: GiaRo88

customer_reviews.title: Great hats
customer_reviews.text: My son has a landscape business so I got these for him & my grandson and they loved them, Florida heat is bad but these were cool and comfortable. Great hats
customer_reviews.author: Patty Smith

customer_reviews.title: Woth IT - easy carry, comfortable protection.
customer_reviews.text: I use this hat in the desert, at the beach, on the boat, I love it. It's keeps the sun off my neck. I used it on my last hike in the desert. It made a difference. It's not heavy and that is actually a plus. It has been even more important now. It is waterproof and with glasses ort goggles you are protected. It folds quickly for easy storage or carry. Sometimes I slip it under my helmet when I ride my e-bike and its a great windbreaker. Slip a mask under and your even more protected. Worth IT.
customer_reviews.author: VantasticOdyssey

customer_reviews.title: Only good for neck protection
customer_reviews.text: Yes, this is lightweight and comfortable but it fits not protect you from the sun. Looking at the product you think it’d protect up to your ears if you bring the back flap down but in reality, it only protects your neck. You don’t get all the coverage you need when you’re hiking in the sun unless you bring down the front mask protection - by full I mean neck and sides of your face and ears.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Needs more material in back
customer_reviews.text: I like this hat because it covers my face. The only drawback is that when I snap the rear flap around my neck, it draws up from behind leaving the base of my rear neck exposed to the sun. If I were wearing a collar this might not be a problem, but with a collarless shirt, it is a problem. If only they had provided more material in the neck flap, I would have given this 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Both are issues that can easily and cheaply be fixed
customer_reviews.text: the front piece uses velcro to attach and is a little weak in my opinion. The rear drape uses hooks that are not the most secure. Both are issues that can easily and cheaply be fixed. The craftsmanship otherwise is superb. This hat is excellent value
customer_reviews.author: Donald Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Got two because I like them so much
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight keeps you cool, protects your neck from the sun. Folds easy but comes back to shape. Can wash on gentle in the washer, has a great little flap in the front to cover your face if you want. I love these hats and would get them again if I needed another one.
customer_reviews.author: S. Montalvo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for working in the hot sun
customer_reviews.text: I volunteer at a historic cemetery, mowing and trimming in intense heat. This hat is PERFECT. Much cooler than my usual ball cap, love the detachable face shield, and place for my pony tail. I am thrilled with this, as it keeps the sun off and is very lightweight. The cord keeps it secure. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: PhillyAdGirl

customer_reviews.title: Excellent coverage, breathable mask if you keep moving.
customer_reviews.text: This hat fits well and provides excellent coverage. The only real issues are that the face shield's attachment via velcro will eventually wear out and/or rip free, and that face shield is a bit tight against the lower eye. Still, I don't regret the purchase and use the hat frequently for hikes.
customer_reviews.author: Goldenu

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: Daughter is on medication that causes her to sunburn even easier than usual which is basically in the blink of an eye because we are pale redheads. She does a lot of volunteer work outside in the sun and this has really made a huge difference in the amount of time she can be out without burning.
customer_reviews.author: K. Gerber

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one to try and keep the dust and grass from getting on my neck while I mowed. The clips are plastic, so have to be careful taking the flaps off. Wish I had done this years ago. In conjunction with safety goggles and a neck gaiter, a gust of wing blowing tons of dirt and grass back on me doesn't faze me know. Wish I had bought one years ago.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Shaw

customer_reviews.title: Great hat for going undercover.
customer_reviews.text: This is one fun hat. It covers my over sized knoggen, the back of my neck and my greek-god hairy face. The face part does have tiny holes in it and my stash plus beard pokes out of it and has a tendency to scare little children and hot chicks. Otherwise it's a fun hat to have and practicle.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Kayaking.
customer_reviews.text: It's lightweight and the neck cover is perfect for kayaking. One thing I found was the mask in the front saved me when I forgot my mask for the COVID-19 requirements. I had my hat in the car and it worked perfectly. I don't think I would depend on it for that kind of protection but in an emergency it was great!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy McGraw

customer_reviews.title: rather painful. But skin that was covered by long sleeves ...
customer_reviews.text: This hat was an absolute skin-saver on a recent trip to Death Valley. People think of the heat-- sure, it was hot (118 degrees F), but heat wasn't the issue. It was the light. Skin exposed to the sun would actually start cooking. You could feel it...rather painful. But skin that was covered by long sleeves (or this wonderful hat) was just fine. Lightweight, breathable, and adorable, quite frankly.
customer_reviews.author: CC Mac

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my big headed hubby. He can almost never find a hat that fits his head and i searched high and low before i bought this one and reasonably priced. I believe his hat size is 7 3/4. Hubby lives it qears it fishing and working in the yard. Not mask..says it makes him look like Shredder
customer_reviews.author: anjiestar

customer_reviews.title: Still getting sunburn
customer_reviews.text: I live in TX and wearing this hat does help with blocking some of the sun. However, I used it during a 2 hours of roof repair, my face and head still feel a little burned after first 20 mins, though it is hot in TX but I dont think this hat can perform what it is described in terms of sun blocking.
customer_reviews.author: Haiquan

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended by Lawn Mower
customer_reviews.text: I use this weekly for commercial mowing and it is fantastic for keeping you from breathing in clippings or anything else that gets thrown your direction from a mower/trimmer. The neck cover is very effective in keeping away the sun. It does not get hot in 90+ temps. Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Brett Barnett

customer_reviews.title: Husband loved it.  It has a very generous fit, super comfortable, will fir XXX sizes.
customer_reviews.text: We tried other, but ended up returning them, as they fit too snugged, uncomfortable. But this will definitely large sizes. Good quality and very happy with purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M. Snyder

customer_reviews.title: It Works :-)
customer_reviews.text: I just used this on a 200+ mile bicycle ride and was getting attacked by flies as I was traveling Northern Wisconsin trails. I put on this hat and presto no flies in my hair, no flies in my face, no flies or other bugs bothering me at all. Also the vents kept it cool in the 80F degree heat and I could breath easily through the mesh front piece. I love this hat. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Smokin Paul

customer_reviews.title: A great hat to prevent sunburn
customer_reviews.text: I used this hat for the first time on a 4-hour fishing trip. The day was warm, bright and sunny. My face and neck would normally be sunburned by the end of the day and worse the next morning. This hat and neck cover (I did not even use the face cover), in combination with a good sunblock, kept me sunburn free. My wife bought one and used it on the same trip with the neck and face cover. She didn't experience any discomfort and she is also sunburn free.
customer_reviews.author: JPA

product_meta.title: DDYOUTDOOR 07-281 Fashion Summer Outdoor Sun Protection Fishing Cap Neck Face Flap Hat Wide Brim
feature_bullets: New Sun Cap with Flaps (Flaps are removable), Complete Sun Protection UVA / UVB
IDEAL FOR CAMPING, BOATING, FISHING, HIKING OR GARDENING ，LARGE BILL AND BACK FLAP PROVIDES GREAT PROTECTION FROM THE SUN
MESH SIDE PANELS WITH 2 LARGE MESHED BRASS EYELETS FOR VENTILATION ，Windproof / UV protection / Quick-drying
Size: One Size Fits All ,Material: Nylon
